content: n you talk to him next, ask him what he thought of what you had pictured. Unlike some of the other Companions, this doesn't start your official relationship with him per se, but it will make your intentions known and pave the path for it.At the party at your camp after the events at the Grove, you can interact with Gale and he will tell you about how his companion preferred quiet nights reading by a fire over parties. You can comment that it sounds "fun", or ask if he is speaking of Mystra again
